## verbs() function

Returns all verbs, subject to optional filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function verbs(filter?: (verb: Verb) => boolean): Verb[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filter | (verb: Verb) =&gt; boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>
